content: आवर्तन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Turning round or towards. {@--2@} Revolving. --नं {@--1@} Turning round, returning, revolution. {@--2@} Circular motion, gyration. {@--3@} Churning or stirring up anything in fusion. {@--4@} Melting together, fusion, alligation (said of metals). {@--5@} Mid-day, the time when shadows are cast in an opposite direction. {@--6@} Repeating, doing over and over again. {@--7@} Study, practising. --नः Viṣṇu. --नी {@--1@} A crucible. {@--2@} A spoon, ladle.
